markdownRemark.html:
I see people always struggling with include/exclude notation inside use case diagrams. I think these diagrams could explain it better.

Now, lets look at extends diagram. Notice how connections have changed. The example shows uploading photo and video use case with optional use case of applying filter.

Remember:

  • If A includes B: then B must be done inside A.
  • If B extends A: then B can be done inside A (A can use B, but not always)

frontmatter.title: What is difference between includes and extends notation in use case diagram?
